articles.content: Bombay Dyeing and Manufacturing Co.'s decision to sell 22 acres in Worli in central Mumbai for Rs 5,200 crore is one of India's largest land deals. Yet, according to real estate experts, the transact… [+2464 chars]

articles.title: India defends GDP numbers with 10-point response amid data credibility concerns - CNBCTV18
articles.description: India’s real GDP growth was 7.8 percent on year-on-year (y/y) basis in Q1 FY24 as per the Income or Production Approach. Former Chief Economic Advisor Arvind Subramanian, in an article, argued that India’s GDP is not measured from the expenditure side rather …
